document.heading: HISTORIC PROPERTY IMPROVEMENT NOTIFICATION AMENDMENT ACT OF 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-123, the “Historic Property Improvement Notification Amendment Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-429, which was referred to the Committee on Libraries, Parks, Recreation & Planning. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 4, 2012, and February 7, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 21, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-315 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-123 became effective on April 27, 2012.
